Process.name: event ticket groups assigned to resellers
Process.footNote: The defined ticket groups for the event are allocated by assigning blocks of tickets to resellers. Resellers can then sell these tickets to customers. --- Any unassigned tickets in a ticket group are available for direct purchase from the venue. --- The total number of tickets assigned to all resellers cannot exceed the number of tickets available in the ticket group. --- Assignments to each reseller can be increased or decreased. --- If a reseller has already sold tickets in the group, their assignment cannot be changed to less than those sales. --- If the venue makes direct sales for a ticket group, those tickets are not available for assignment to resellers.
